List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

Source: R/crandb-public-api.R, R/print.R
cran_events.Rd

List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

cran_events(releases = TRUE, archivals = TRUE, limit = 10, from = 1)

# S3 method for cran_event_list
summary(object, ...)

# S3 method for cran_event_list
print(x, ...)

Arguments

releases

Whether to include package releases.

archivals

Whether to include package archivals.

limit

Number of events to list.

from

Where to start the list, for pagination.

object

Object to summarize.

...

Additional arguments are ignored currently.

x

Object to print.

Value

List of events.

Examples

cran_events()
#> CRAN events (events)-----------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When     Package     Version Title                                          
#>  - 1 hour   fdacluster  0.1.0   Joint Clustering and Alignment of Functional...
#>  - 1 hour   PCObw       0.0.0   Bandwidth Selector with Penalized Comparison...
#>  - 1 hour   DrInsight   0.1.2   Drug Repurposing: Integration and Systematic...
#>  + 11 hours metaboData  0.6.3   Example Metabolomics Data Sets                 
#>  + 11 hours simplevis   6.1.0   Simple 'ggplot2' and 'leaflet' Visualisation...
#>  + 12 hours Davies      1.2-0   The Davies Quantile Function                   
#>  + 12 hours see         0.6.9   Visualisation Toolbox for 'easystats' and Ex...
#>  + 12 hours polyRAD     1.6     Genotype Calling with Uncertainty from Seque...
#>  + 14 hours Landmarking 1.0.0   Analysis using Landmark Models                 
#>  + 14 hours QuESTr      0.1.1   Constructing Quantitative Environment Sensor...
cran_events(limit = 5, releases = FALSE)
#> CRAN events (archivals)--------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When   Package        Version Title                                         
#>  - 1 hour fdacluster     0.1.0   Joint Clustering and Alignment of Functiona...
#>  - 1 hour PCObw          0.0.0   Bandwidth Selector with Penalized Compariso...
#>  - 1 hour DrInsight      0.1.2   Drug Repurposing: Integration and Systemati...
#>  - 1 day  SWMPrExtension 2.1.0   Functions for Analyzing and Plotting Estuar...
#>  - 1 day  eRTG3D         0.6.4   Empirically Informed Random Trajectory Gene...
cran_events(limit = 5, archivals = FALSE)
#> CRAN events (pkgreleases)------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When     Package    Version Title                                           
#>  + 11 hours metaboData 0.6.3   Example Metabolomics Data Sets                  
#>  + 11 hours simplevis  6.1.0   Simple 'ggplot2' and 'leaflet' Visualisation ...
#>  + 12 hours Davies     1.2-0   The Davies Quantile Function                    
#>  + 12 hours see        0.6.9   Visualisation Toolbox for 'easystats' and Ext...
#>  + 12 hours polyRAD    1.6     Genotype Calling with Uncertainty from Sequen...
summary(cran_events(limit = 10))
#> CRAN events (events)
#>  [1] "fdacluster@0.1.0-" "PCObw@0.0.0-"      "DrInsight@0.1.2-" 
#>  [4] "metaboData@0.6.3"  "simplevis@6.1.0"   "Davies@1.2-0"     
#>  [7] "see@0.6.9"         "polyRAD@1.6"       "Landmarking@1.0.0"
#> [10] "QuESTr@0.1.1"
